Summary: Was the most phenomenal stay for us in many years. This is a true 5 star bed and breakfast. Upon arrival Freda showed us around and gave us many options for places to relax and have our morning breakfast. She then gave us the rundown on what we could do in San Clemente! The sleeping was so comfortable and the breakfasts were phenomenal. Loved every bit of it
Manager Response: Hi Kathy and Kevin  Thank you so much for choosing Always Inn San Clemente B&B and your review.  Please visit again!  Hope you enjoyed Carlsbad and had the chance to see the baby sea lions in LaJolla

Summary: Freda, the property owner and host could not do enough for us! She even went out of her way and picked us up in Anaheim. It was incredibly kind, she had car trouble that day and asked her friend to help get us. We really appreciated it. We were well fed, and very well informed about San Clemente and what to do. We spent a great 4 days there. Thanks to Freda!
Manager Response: Hi Kari and Bob  It was such a pleasure to host you both and I look forward to your return visit to Southern California.  We have had cyclone weather lately.  The gardens are beautiful; we certainly need the rain but miss our sunshine!  Hope you are staying safe and warm this winter!

Summary Heading: Always Welcome! Always Caring -  Always Outstanding
Summary: Always Inn is truly a wonderful place to call "home away from home"   Freda is a quintessential hostess, who knows everything about San Clemente and was eager to make my stay enjoyable!   I came to visit my Son,  Daughter in Law and new Grandson! Because of Covid and traveling across the country we were being extra careful!!   Freda gave me a room with a patio and invited them for breakfast which happened to be Father's Day!   Who could ask for more!   It was delicious, delightful and memorable!!!   Always Inn is not to be missed!!
Room tip: Truthfully Freda will recommend the best room based on your needs - you will be well taken care of!
Manager Response: Connie!!!!  Thanks for your lovely review.  Please come to breakfast before you leave your precious family!

Summary Heading: Above and beyond is an understatement
Summary: This is my second stay to Allways inn in San Clemente visiting my son nearby. The location is perfect matched by the wonderful owner Freda, a true hostess who could not be more kind and caring about her guests.   It is as perfect as a B and B should be. Freda knows all about the San Clemente community and beyond, and she shared her knowledge and was immeasurably helpful to me and my family. I am thankful to have returned and look forward to my next visit to my son and to be here moving from one astounding garden area to another and spending some time with the extraordinary Freda.     Nancy S from Boston.
Manager Response: Hi Nancy, look forward to seeing you again in San Clemente!  Please visit when we have the first Saturday of the month arts and crafts sale!  Stay safe and warm this winter in Boston!

Summary: Staying at the Always Inn was such a wonderful experience for our anniversary. Freda was such a fun and caring innkeeper, that we feel that we've made a friend for life. Not only did she give great recommendations for where to eat, but she also made sure that we were taken care of at whichever restaurant we chose, which gave us wonderful culinary experiences. The room we stayed in was cute and even had a jacuzzi tub. The cherry on top of the great time was being allowed to bring our kitties. It can be difficult to find pet friendly places to stay, so we very much appreciated being able to bring the kids. I recommend Always Inn 1000%!

Summary Heading: It doesn't get any better than this! A great place to stay for work trips or vacations
Summary: The Always Inn has become my home away from home. I travel down to San Clemente for work and am so grateful to have found this B&B a few years back. The location provides the opportunity to walk to the beach in less than 10min to catch the sunrise, and the best restaurants in San Clemente are within blocks. That being said you won't need to eat out much with the incredible breakfast and snacks that are included with your stay. For anyone that appreciates good food and local ingredients this place is for you. It is truly a rare gem and I couldn't recommend it more highly.

I found myself thinking I was staying with a friend's cool grandma. The inn is clearly a labor of love, from the whimsical decor to the variety of food and the care Freda takes to talk to her guests. We let our regular life fade from our memories and relaxed in the garden, with the fire feature and in the firm foam topped bed. Breakfast is LARGE, don't plan for an early lunch. We even got sent home with some food so we didn't have to worry about cooking when we got home. We're already trying to figure out when we can return.  The location was fantastic there are so many shops, bars and restaurants within walking distance. The beach is an easy walk (but slightly harder to walk back up). We parked our car and didn't use it until we left.
Manager Response: Hi Cynthia and Ryan, thank you so much for the great review of your stay at Always Inn San Clemente Bed & Breakfast.  I bought   a building with no roof, plumbing, heating and electrical in 1999 and opened the inn in 2004 and I was so grateful to save this old home, which had such good bones, and to build a garden oasis with courtyard, patios and deck for my guests to simply relax, unwind and allow me to pamper them!  Next time you want to come down, just call, text or email me.  Please email me which of the goodies I sent home with you that you liked best!  Hugs,  Freda

Summary: Dear Freda.   Thank you so much for hosting us in your lovely historic home.  The Sea Mist room was very comfortable and we enjoyed the patio area to relax outside.     And even though the quantity of time was short a quality of time spent there was well worth it.    Perfect location to quickly walk to all of our destinations including the pier, shops, restaurants and nightlife music.    We enjoyed meeting you and appreciate all your insights and look forward to a longer visit next time  Thanks again for the scrumptious breakfast and sending us home with even more home cooked goodies.  Thanks again…see you soon!!! Dave/Sandy
Manager Response: Hi Dave and Sandy, please stay longer next time!  Was happy to send you both home with home made food for you both, your Mom/Mom-in-law and Sandy's sister!  Can certainly appreciate how much caregivers need a break now and then.  My two sisters did most of the caregiving for our Mom and I'm still in awe of the selfless care they delivered!

Summary: We loved our stay here!  Freda was a wonderful host.  She was very helpful because she is so knowledgeable of the area.  Her home was lovely!  Very private yet still in the middle of town.  Perfect location to walk everywhere!  The back porch with the gentle breeze was therapeutic. :)  Every morning we had an amazing breakfast, homemade with very generous servings!  We could always go back for more.   Freda was so kind, giving, and helpful!  We will be back!!
Manager Response: Hi Grace, thanks so much for choosing Always Inn San Clemente for your getaway!  Thanks for your kind words!  Please return again soon and keep in mind the dates for the festivals and special events through the rest of 2021 and in 2022!  You'll have front row parking and a great location to enjoy!

Summary: The always inn B&B is one of my favorite places my boyfriend and I have had stayed. The host, Freda, was so kind and helpful and the location of the B&B is unbeatable! You can walk to over a hundred of San Clemente's shops and restaurants, not to mention it is less than a 5 minute drive to the beach. The food was delicious and the space very clean. We won't stay anywhere else when we come back to visit!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review!  Can't wait to host you both again!

Summary: Freda’s bed & breakfast was the getaway I didn’t know I needed. She is an amazing owner, cook, customer-service coordinator, and human being. She does everything with love and it shows. The home is kept clean and is very welcoming.   The only photo I took was of a beach mat Freda provides for guests at the beach which was only 3 blocks away! After working out and swimming, I arrived back at Always Inn to an amazing breakfast made by Freda.   Definitely coming back soon!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for choosing Always Inn San Clemente for your getaway!  I love living in my little oasis in the heart of our sweet downtown village! Thanks for your kind words!  Please return again soon and keep in mind the dates for the festivals and special events through the rest of 2021 and in 2022!  You'll have front row parking and a great location to enjoy!

Summary: Originally booked to stay at a motel in the area while dining at Avila’s we noticed this funky little casita with blue tiles across the street. Little did I realize at that moment we’d be staying there the next night looking for an alternative to the uncomfortable place we’d been duped by. (See previous review). Always Inn is mind you in someone’s home  . Within a few hours we got a yes you can stay. We picked the room with the larger bed and settled in. Firm comfy bed, iron, hooks to hang our clothes and a place to put our suitcases at the foot of the bed. Our room faced the outdoor patio and led conveniently to the parking space provided for us in the driveway. The bathtub equipped with jet streams was a welcome way to relax the next morning using the Epsom salts thoughtfully

Freda’s place is absolutely wonderful and Freda will tend to your every need- recommending great places to eat and explore around San Clemente. It is also in the perfect location to explore San Clemente- whether that’s the beach or the shops and restaurants!! You won’t regret booking. The breakfast was also incredible, Freda’s home cooking is fantastic!
Manager Response: Hi Lydia and Doug, thank you so much for choosing Always Inn San Clemente!  Sorry I didn't get to give you both hugs goodbye...or at least until your next visit to Southern CA.  Look forward to hosting you both again!    BTW:  Did you get over the allergic dryness from Joshua National Park?  Did the Dove Repair Patch help?  My allergies have been kicking up in full force from the Santa Ana winds the past couple of days.  Hugs,  Freda

Summary: Excellent location. Very cozy - it felt as if I was walking into my own home everyday. Freda, the owner, is more than amazing. Her customer service couldn’t be better. She makes sure you are well taken care of and puts so much love into her cooking. The rooms have so much character and are well kept and clean. You can smell the ocean from the patios. Everything about our stay at Always Inn was beautiful. Definitely recommend and will be back!

We take a mother-daughter trip to San Clemente each August.  This year we decided to venture out a bit and try a B&B.  How lucky and delighted we are to have found Freda and Always Inn!    Freda was super friendly and  hospitable, and was extremely knowledgable about the area.  She gave us wonderful tips on things to see and do, and, as we love to thrift shop, she directed us to the best second hand stores (or, as she calls it, the Rodeo drive of San Clemente).  She even introduced us to a shop owner who went the extra mile to help us find what we were looking for.  The Inn is right in town, just a block off Del Mar, but has beautiful gardens on three sides of the home that make it a true urban oasis.  It's just a half block from the free trolley (which runs down to the pier and
Manager Response: Linda and Rachel,   thanks so much for your reviews!  Please keep in touch and hope you can make it to the San Clemente Historic Home Tour, 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. on Saturday, Oct. 12, 2019.  Our town founder Ole Hanson's home is going to be on tour!  I'm chairing the event and we are doing a fun quiz with prizes: "discover this architectural detail that was/is a signature Ole Hanson motif. "  We'll have prizes and an after party at the home of the President of the Historical Society.  This Sunday, Sept. 1 is the monthly Art Faire downtown and my favorite friends of the library book sale...with DVDs for $1. I must be one of the last of the dinosaurs collecting DVDs even though the inn has Netflix, et al.  Next time you'll have to carve out time to try the second hand shops in San Juan Capistrano and visit the Mission San Juan Capistrano.  Hugs,  Freda

Summary Heading: Always Inn Bed And Breakfast PERFECT!!!177 Avenida Cabrillo, San Clemente Cali
Summary: Freda, The B&B Owner And Hostess Was So Amazing!!!  The Room Was Very Cozy And Clean. There Was So Many Kool And Different Interesting Artifacts Decorations Everywhere.  THEE BREAKFAST, FRUITS, SMACKS And Plenty Of These Along With Various Beverages!!! Yummy!!!   We Found, Always Inn B&B Online, And It Was A Very Comfortable Homie Place. If You’ve Never Stayed At A B&B This Place And It’s Settings Are A PERFECT B&B!!! I Prefer Staying HERE At A PLACE LIKE A FAMILY Members HOME!!!

Summary Heading: Always Inn should be Forever Closed
Summary: We really wanted to like this property but found it difficult. The one thing we agreed on is the location is fantastic. If you’re ok with that being enough than you’re in a good spot. Otherwise, seriously, keep looking.  The house is a mess and the gardens are overgrown. There is so much furniture and every space is filled with dusty things, it was hard to walk through what little space is left! There might be treasures buried under something to admire but they can’t be seen through the filth. Where there is no space on top of furniture or on the wall for decorations then it’s stashed under or behind the furniture. Hoarding came to mind. I was so stunned at the condition of the house I made a decision not to eat any food put out.  We were told we had “the big room”. I can’t

Disappointing!!   I booked this place back in Feb for a very special occasion, celebrating my best friends 50th birthday with my other best friend.    1. disappointment: pictures on the website do not reflect anything that you stayed in, I wish I would have taken pictures.    2. disappointment: the "Ocean Dance" room was cluttered as well as the whole inside of the B&B, not to mention the outside.  The floors were dirty and we had little room to put our personal belongings anywhere.   3. disappointment: the cooking preparation odor was overwhelming and it was hard to sleep, no AC in the room (at least there was a fan!) and the twin bed on rollers was squeaky and uncomfortable.   Based on the website and what I experienced the two do not match and unfortunately it was misleading

My girlfriends booked this B&B as a surprise for my 50th Birthday!  The website touts, “all the amenities of a four-star hotel, without extra charges“ yeah ... not so much!!  The home itself is cluttered far beyond “charming”. It’s more like a home from the show Hoarder’s. Trying to navigate through the front room, down the hallway to our bedroom was an obstacle course of chaos. I was terrified I would bump into one of the many “trinkets” and break something.   We stayed in the Ocean Dance Bedroom. The photos on the website are VERY outdated - They do not adequately represent the space. The bedding, room setup and decor look NOTHING like the photos online. ***Gosh, I wish we had taken photos**  The rug is gone and the floors were disgustingly dirty. Our feet were BLACK from the

Summary Heading: Horrible!!!!  This was our first experience with a bed and breakfast.  Filthy, cluttered extremely unpleasant.
Summary: Freda was very pleasant when we booked but she is not a nice person once she gets your money, she charged our credit card before we even arrived and overcharged I requested an itemized bill and never received it.  Once I questioned the bill she became very unpleasant we ended up leaving without breakfast on our last day because it was late just like the first day and when my Husband went to talk to her she told him, he was welcome back but I wasn’t.  She is a lunatic, keep looking, go elsewhere, I have no idea how she was able to get any positive referrals.

Summary Heading: Charming property, Excellent Location. Delightful Host.
Summary: Excellent location. This is not a paid review. Since the other posts do such an excellent job of talking about the great points, let me set the record straight on complaints I have seen.   This property was NOT dirty. it was a little cluttered with decorations for my taste, but that is more of a style preference than a complaint.   The food was EXCELLENT. I have read reviews about rotten food, but I saw none except one spoiled orange forgotten in a fruit bowl, not a concern! Don't pay attention to the whiners!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments. I love all my shell decor and truly appreciate that it is not to everyone's liking.  Look forward to hosting you again!  Hugs,  Freda

Summary Heading: A unique find in San Clemente
Summary: As you can tell from many of the other reviews/comments on the page that this is something different. Freda is a citizen of the world and enjoys her role as innkeeper and hostess of this 3 unit B&B one house of the old downtown.   From the moment I made the reservation and her nearly immediate call to go over what our breakfast would be the next day. To the array of  fresh fruit and snacks that are available 24x7, my son and I felt like guests at someone's home.  The rooms are not huge but the beds are TempurPedic and comfy - there are so many sitting areas inside and outside your room (common areas and patios) that there are always places to be and hang out. The wifi is fast and well the breakfast is great.  In the morning I tried to explain to my 12 year old son that this
Manager Response: Dear Josh:  It was such a pleasure to host you and Eli!  Please return again soon and bring your wife so she can enoy our sweet Spanish Village By The Sea!  Valued our talks at breakfast.....we may not be able to change the world but we can surely touch ONE person/heart/soul at a time.    So delighted to converse with a likeminded, thoughtful person!!  Thank you for your five star review!  Hugs,  Freda

Summary: Freda is a wonderful host! She helped us 'iron out' a misunderstanding right from the start.  Her warm personality, and delicious breakfasts are unmatched. She recommended a few good restaurants while we were in San Clemente celebrating our 45th wedding anniversary, and even got us tickets to a few local venues. Oh yeah, she had a bottle of champaign waiting for us when we arrived also! The B&B is a little cramped right now (hence the 4 stars) with MANY delightful objects, but I'm guessing it's because she has just recently put another property up for sale. Freda makes you feel very welcome!

My wife and I were given a weekend getaway by her sister for Christmas. I called to confirm our reservation and Freda asked if we had any food allergies or anything we did not eat. I thought it was nice that she took the time to think of us. explained we probably wouldn't arrive until later. She didn't have a problem with that. We arrived at the appointed time and were warmly greeted by our hostess and made to feel right at home. The room was comfortable, the breakfasts were AMAZING! When they defined bed and breakfast, I thing they were thinking of this place. Close to everything in San Clemente, beach, dining, nightlife. All in all, a great weekend.      Thank you Freda for a wonderful time,  Karen and Reb
Manager Response: Hi Karen and Reb, so glad to have had the opportunity to host you both at Always Inn San Clemente Bed & Breakfast. Please visit again!   When I get Always Inn Tucson Bed & Breakfast up and running, I'll let you and your sister know so you can take advantage of the repeat guest discount! Hugs, Freda

Summary: Freda is a sweet-talking owner on the telephone until you see her real side when trying to do cancellation with her.  If you don't believe then try to tell you are canceling the booking and you will see her real nasty personality come out.  I didn't have my confirmation number from the web booking site so I asked her to look it up for me before the 14 days cancellation period and found it was from Hotels.com.  I asked her to cancel but she said she can't before the 14 days because the website is the one that is charging me, not her.   This turns out to be a LIE that she told me after I spoke with Hotels.com on 1/4/19 after they finally sent me the confirmation number.   Hotels.com told me that she is the one that is going to charge me not them.   Who am I going to believe
Manager Response: Dear Tyler:  You called me on New Year’s Day – at first saying you couldn’t find the email confirmation for your reservation at Always Inn San Clemente on Jan. 12-15, 2019.  You said you had made it through booking.com or hotels.com.    I asked for your name and looked on booking.com; no match.  Then I looked on hotels.com and found the match.  I mentioned to you that I couldn’t process your card and would do it on the day of arrival.  Then you said you had contacted Hotels.com two days prior because you found a lower rate on booking.com but hadn’t heard back from hotels.com.  As someone who has been in the hospitality business for 27 years, I immediately saw red flags. First you say you don't know who you booked through, and then you say you contacted hotels.com after you found a lower rate on booking.com?   I went on my website and told you what my rates were.  I offered to honor what you found on booking.com if you sent me that screenshot.  You then asked about what type of accommodations you had booked, so I sent you photos.  These are the same photos on our online travel partners.  On January 4 you called me at 5:30 a.m. Pacific Time to ask me to send you the reservation confirmation.  After I made breakfast for guests I referred your calls and texts to hotels.com so they could reach out to you.  I have had the same 14-day prior to arrival cancellation policy for 27 years as a bed and breakfast operator.  You threatened me with negative reviews and then asked me again to waive the cancellation penalty “since hotels.com did not send me a confirmation.”  That statement is false since when you FIRST called me you knew the exact amount hotels.com charged you and the exact amount you found on booking.com.  I learned a long time ago that “There is no right way to do a wrong thing.”  Guests like you who do the wrong thing and then resort to lies and threats is sad.  I'm a human being who takes good care of her guests. Despite your threats, I was a professional who firmly said no to your request. I'm sorry you don't like my answer or the 14-day cancellation policy, but with only three rooms, such a policy is needed.  BTW, Always Inn has absolutely NO carpet and our beds are Tempur-Pedic with Tempur-Pedic mattress toppers.

Summary: Dont quite know how to even describe this little piece of heaven.  Freda is just a delightful host....her cooking is to die for and not like any other B & B breakfast I have ever had!  Freda...and Indy open up their home as if you were family and the most incredible treasures inside.  Would highly recommend Always Inn.
Manager Response: Joyce, Jim and Cheech, so glad you found Always Inn San Clemente and we look forward to seeing the three of you again.  We'd love to host more wonderful guests like you traveling with their four-legged family members.  You should have seen Indy downing her lamb shanks this morning....think she likes lamb even more than the bison and steaks.  I'm going to offer up the inn as a whole house rental so those having family reunions, birthdays and anniversaries can all stay in once place, park, and enjoy all the shops and restaurants within steps of the inn!

Summary: We stayed here for a couple of nights. The location is very convenient to downtown and the accommodations are great. The ownerFrida, makes exceptional breakfasts that kept us full all day! SHe knows a lot about the area and was very helpful in giving us tips of things to see.
Manager Response: Hi Diann, look forward to seeing you both in SC again. Next time bring the doggies!

Summary Heading: Fantastic place for my business trip stay!
Summary: I stayed at the Inn for a couple days and loved the amazing location with shops and restaurants all right outside the door, downtown walking, and easy jog to the ocean!  The Inn is fantastic feels like you are staying with a friend, breakfast made to order, comfy living room, and tables/chairs on porches where I could work on my laptop while enjoying the beautiful weather.  Can't be beat!
Manager Response: So glad you were able to have a mini working vacation at Always Inn San Clemente! I love our downtown location so close to everything and am delighted guests take advantage of the shops and restaurants just steps away and our great 2.8 mile beach trail.  Look forward to hosting you again soon!  Next time bring your four-legged family member!

Summary Heading: The best b&b I’ve ever been in with my husband
Summary: Freda and Indie (the pet) were so welcoming. The bedroom and private bathroom were clean, comfortable and very quiet, the terrace too cute, snacks were available all days. Special point for two things : Freda give us all the best addresses ( restaurants, shops, cultural sites...), the flat is situated on the heart of San Clemente so everything can be done while walking and she cooks so well typical Californian breakfast (enough to hold until evening).  If you are looking for authenticity to live like real Californian people, this is the place to stay
Manager Response: Nolwen, thank you so much for your kind words! Hugs to you and Paul and your family in Alsace. Please email me a photo of you both, your little boy and doggie to share with my daughter! I love living in the heart of our sweet little downtown village, walking distance to all the boutiques, shops, restaurants, art galleries, the playhouse and the pier/beach! I've tried to create a little oasis in the heart of the village with the front courtyard, the side patios with succulents and the "people watching deck" off Ola Vista.  So it is great when guests from all over the world fall in love with San Clemente!  I'm waiting to hear from Paul about that website app he was talking about; can't find it! Hugs, Freda and Indy.

Summary Heading: Amazing experience - it felt like home to me!
Summary: I had planned to stay there for a night, I ended up extending my booking for other 3 nights. It was a unique experience, Freda the owner is such a kind and welcoming woman. She truly loves her job and is passionate about making new customers feeling at home. Breakfast was unreal - she cooked so many nice meals, and it was the best kick off every day! Always smiling and taking care of you, but still it's a good place where you get privacy and quiet relaxing time off (the garden outside the house is charming, enjoy it as much as possible! It's a clean place with amazing art pieces that make it even more interesting! Do come and stay here if you are in the area. I will surely be back soon!
Manager Response: Hi Ami, Indy and I miss you! Please keep in touch and I'll send you the calendar of 2019 events so you can plan your visit in the spring.  So glad you discovered the sweet little Spanish Village by the Sea of San Clemente and our Always Inn Bed & Breakfast.  Hope your Mom, Dad and Grandmother liked the cookbooks and photos of the gardens at Casa Romantica and Always Inn.  Hugs and love,  Freda and Indy

Summary: My wife and I were fortunate to spend the weekend of our 34th wedding anniversary at the "Always Inn".  Choosing this B &B was one of the best decisions we've made all year, Freda is a charming, delightful host and is hands down one of the best cooks we've ever met.  The location of the B & B is ideal......easy walking distance to the pier and to local  restaurants. The Inn itself is beautiful and the room we stayed in, the Palm Whisper, was incredibly quiet for a downtown location (didn't hear any noise at all), If you want a peaceful and restful B & B; The Always Inn should Always be your #1 choice.  Thanks, Freda, for a wonderful memory
Manager Response: Sean and Sharon, thank you so much for honoring Indy and me by choosing Always Inn San Clemente for your 34th anniversary celebration!  Trust the photos that I took of you both on your way to dinner will add to your memories.    Hope you have a few more special and restful days leading up to your son's wedding!    I'll be in touch when I'm in Vista to visit Garcia Farms for new succulents in September and drop off some home cooking to share with your three tall sons and new and future daughters-in-law.  Loved our conversations at breakfast and look forward to seeing you both again soon!  Hugs,  Freda and Indy

Summary: Always Inn B&B is the very best B&B experience Ever!!! Freda is the best host in the world, she made a 5 course breakfast for us every morning, snacks and beverages were available all day. Freda’s cooking is amazing!!! The home is clean and everything you need. Freda gave us tons help ideas on where to go out to dinner and wonderful attractions. I am missing the breakfast , the loveliest host ever, and her adorable dog Indy 500! Freda’s warm  hospitality and happy energy made the time spent at Always Inn a true pleasure!! We look forward to going back soon to visit and stay at the best BNB Ever!!! Thank you Freda and Indy 500!!

I had a wonderful stay.  The room was pleasant and the breakfast was fabulous.  Freda is a gracious and friendly host.  The inn is in the downtown district and within walking distance of restaurants and shops.  Great spot.  I definitely plan to stay here again the next time I am in San Clemente.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your sweet review! Please visit again and bring your sweetie!

Summary: From our arrival to the time we left, everyone in our group was made to feel like treasured guests!  This house is comfortable, conveniently located and very clean.  The gardens are inspiring.  Freda is the most incredible hostess!  She recommended the best restaurant and made reservations for us (and let us know that the restaurant provided free corkage so we could take our own wine!).  She helped us plan our day in San Clemente and even provided us with beach chairs, beach blankets and water bottles.  I know it is supposed to be a bed and breakfast, but from the moment we arrived Freda was feeding us!  There were healthy snacks, homemade cookies and fruit whenever we felt hungry.  She even sent snacks with us on our way home ("because you have to eat on the plane!").  The

My husband and I attend the Ocean Festival yearly and would never want to stay anywhere else. Freda is a wonderful woman and the wealth of knowledge.   She steered us to the best antique shops and restaurants.  She cooked amazing food for us and always anticipated our needs which weren't many.  I gained a few pounds in a two night stay cause she kept feeding us.  Beds were comfy and I slept so well.  The location is perfect.  Easy walk to the pier, shops,and restaurants.   She is a special hostess and a friend. Very eclectic interior which I love.   You must check out the gardens also

Summary Heading: De-LIGHT-ful Days and Nights at The Always Inn
Summary: Hubby and I had to get out of the 120 degree heat that hit Palm Desert the end of June, so we headed to San Clemente and found this delightful B&B located in the middle of this darling town.  Perfect location for walking down to San Clemente Pier for fresh fish and taking in the beautiful view with ocean breezes.  Freda, the Owner and Operator of this Inn greeted us with such warmth and hospitality - she reminded me of a favorite Aunt that just doodles over you!  Our room was absolutely first class just the right size, with our own bathroom and mini-fridge (to keep our wine chilled!).  The best part of our stay was Freda's breakfast each day on the front terrace.  Her breakfast burrito, her vege omelet, her homemade sausage - DELISH!  These should be featured on a cooking show!
Manager Response: Bev and Allan, you were such a pleasure to host and get to know. Thank you for the kind words and compliments! Two weeks ago we received TripAdvisor's Excellence Award again!! Yeah!!  Today is the set up day for Ocean Festival...wish you were here -  the guy that makes the shell chimes only comes this weekend and one weekend in August, so Always Inn regular guests make sure they book for those dates!   When the heat of the desert gets to you this August, please come visit!  I have three new breakfast inventions I want you both to try.  I made a batch of the soup and thought of you, Allan. Hope you are back to your usual self!  Hugs,   Freda and Indy

Summary: This was a unique experience for my husband & myself.  We travel often & have stayed in a variety of establishments.  This B & B & the owner, Frieda, get the "over-the-top" award. When you book a room, she emails 5 pages of things to see & do within 25 miles.  Included is a list of the amenities she offers at her charming inn. There are 3 rooms offered for your pleasure & each has its own charm.  We stayed in Ocean Mist with a back patio & a parking spot within feet of our room.  The room was neat & immaculate.  It was obvious it had just been cleaned.  Each room has its own bathroom with all the necessary toilitries & then some. Breakfast was at 9 with a choice of the dining table, your own patio or the courtyard patio. To say the breakfast was delicious would be an
Manager Response: Hi Sue and Bill, thanks so much for the kind words. Glad you both had some R&R away from the heat in our sweet little Spanish Village by the Sea, Please try to make it to the San Clemente Garden Club's fall sale. Goin' Nativ also has a great festival this fall at Reata Park in San Juan Capistrano. Please stay in touch and look forward to hosting you both again soon. Hugs, Freda and Indy

Summary Heading: Sub Standard Place from every angle! Filthy Dirty!
Summary: Stayed there with wife and two kids a while back. We arrived later in the evening and could not find a place to park! Kept on driving around to find a convenient place to park nothing! I called the lady we made the reservation with trying to find out from her where we were supposed to park and only got her voicemail and she did not return the call, next day when I asked her she said she was at a friends party and did not hear the phone!!!! Finally after about 30 minutes of driving around and around and around we managed to slip into a spot behind the inn, we finally got to one of what appears to be 3 rooms in the INN. Room was really tight for 4 people. Sleeper couch when opened had a dead Roach which caused our kids not to want to sleep in it! No one from management around to
Manager Response: This review is fraudulent; I’m only chuckling about the timing because Tripadvisor.com just announced that we had won an Award of Excellence again in 2017.  Here are my responses to some of the red flag lies in the review:  1.	Always Inn cannot accommodate four guests in a room. Our maximum occupancy is three and is posted on every partner website. If guests come with more than three guests, I offer them an upgrade to my two-bedroom, two-bath Always San Clemente Beach Rentals. 2.	We do not have a “pull out couch: in any of our inn rooms. We subscribe to a regular Terminex service, so there definitely would NOT be roaches, dead or otherwise, at our inn. 3.	We do not serve hotdogs for breakfast, ever! I have purchased Angus beef hot dogs for my neighbor’s two dogs. 4.	We send out a lengthy email to each guest letting them know their room name and location, where to park, etc.  We have three clearly designated parking spaces on site.  5.	We do not have any metal racks with onions, veggies, etc. in the hallway.  Never have, never will. 6.	Each guest room is cleaned using a 27 item checklist prior to guest arrival. 7.	Our stellar reviews from guests who truly HAVE stayed at Always Inn speak for themselves.  The sole intent of the reviewer I am filing a report about was to drop us from our hard-won five star rating. Shame on the reviewer for resorting to dirty lies, every pun intended.

Summary: Our preference are established Bed and Breakfast inns and we found a real gem at Always Inn San Clemente B&B. This quaint property offered comfort, interesting surroundings and personalized attention. And we found the owner, Freda, has created warm eclectic accommodations and atmosphere, ideal location and personalized friendly service, with her delicious food that rivals any 5 star hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for choosing Always Inn San Clemente for your getaway! It is thanks to guests like you and your feedback that we recently won 4 stars on Expedia and other online travel partners. Keep coming back so you can try my new recipes! Hugs, Freda and Indy

Summary Heading: Five Hours on the Train to Travel 25 Minutes from Home
Summary: We got stuck in the rain when our trip from San Diego to Santa Barbara were cancelled by Amtrak in the worst storm in SOCal for at east 10 years. So to redeem our four day get away, we headed south and found the Always Inn, called Freda and she instantly assured us we'd be taken care of with warm beverages, cookies, a room downtown close, a hearty breakfast, hot tubs, more movies than you could ever sort through, and even help us in getting from the train station to her place in the pouring rain. We found the Always Inn an eclectic warm home, filled with art from all over the world almost and extraordinary as Freda's hospitality. We were wooed into staying two nights, and are so glad we did. The Always Inn is like no place we have stayed before. We're going back.

My boyfriend and I stayed here in Feb 2017. What a pleasure Freda the owner was amazing. Her home is filled with art from all over the world a garden that is amazing and she is so much fun. It was pouring down rain and being in her home was warm and welcoming not to mention she is an amazing chef. Breakfast was 5 star. Highly recommend.

We stayed here over the 3 day holiday ( MLK). The place was centrally located. We could walk everywhere to shops, restaurants, bars, the Cabrillo playhouse, and the San Clemente pier.  The room was cozy and nice. It has a shower/bathtub with jets like a spa!  Wonderful. It has a t.v. and a comfortable bed.  Freda catered a lovely 5 course dinner for us. We also had a 5 course breakfast!  Very good food, and plenty to eat. The inn is filled with wonderful pieces of art that she gathered during her travels. This is more like staying at a good friends home, than the typical B& B. We have stayed at 5 Star resorts and at modest motels. This was worth every penny!
Manager Response: Hi Ronald, thank you so much for the 5-star review...it means a lot since you have stayed at so many amazing places and experienced the best of the best in hospitality. Look forward to hearing your Christmas CD and welcoming you both again to Always Inn or one of my beach rentals in San Clemente! Hugs, Freda and Indy

Summary: We are regulars to San Clemente but decided to try something different so we booked a last minute stay at the Always Inn over Christmas.  I'm so glad we did.  The Inn was filled with the Christmas Spirit and Freda was a wonderful host.  Our room was comfortable and inviting.  We chatted with Freda each morning as she served up an amazing home cooked breakfast.    The Inn is located in the perfect spot in the heart of San Clemente.  We thoroughly enjoyed our visit.  It was great meeting you Freda.  Give Indy a hug from us and say hi to Faz.  It was a pleasure to meet her too.  Oh, and thanks for the soup you sent home with us, it was delicious.
Manager Response: Hi Rose and Joel, Thanks so much for the review! So glad you found us and look forward to your return visit!  Indy is doing well! Fazileh just left for San Francisco - she experienced the Rose Bowl Parade in person and thoroughly enjoyed the Mission San Juan Capistrano, the Casa Romantica, whale watching and the Huntington Library, Museum and Gardens.....plus all the local restaurants.  Glad you liked the soup! Happy to share the recipe.   It's raining today so I'm making a small batch of spicy vegetarian chili for my vegan friends and the ladies at the post office and a five quart batch of beef chili for the retail neighbors on del mar avenue and seniors.  Keep in touch and next time bring family and friends and stay at my beach rentals!  Haven't found the right metal mermaid sculpture to send Joel but have one Lu Varner shelled up that is gorgeous!  Hugs,  Freda and Indy

Summary: Frieda is a wonderful hostess. We were the only family at the B&B so she made us a five and three course breakfast respectively for the nights we stayed. She was so lovely and treated us like family even though we had never met. I have been to a few B&Bs and definitely have never had breakfasts that delicious. Only one other B&B came close to matching her service (in Scotland). I got kudos from my husband for finding this place. Great value. We will definitely be returning when time/money permits.
Manager Response: Hi Taylor, it was such a pleasure to host the three of you; please come visit again and bring the other two children so they can enjoy the beach townhouse. Thanks again for the kind comments! BTW, I washed the baby blanket and need your address info to mail it to you. Hugs, Freda and Indy

Summary Heading: Cozy spot in the heart of San Clemente!
Summary: My husband and I were visiting San Diego for a friends wedding. He used to live in San Clemente and we decided to take a night to explore the area. We decided on Always Inn and are so happy that we did! Freda was a phenomenal host and gave us great tips on the area. She provided EVERYTHING we could have ever needed. Beach towels, beach seats, toiletries, books, DVDs, water bottles etc! We were a nice walking distance from the beach (big hill, might be to far for some) and enjoyed a nap on the beach. We ate dinner on the pier at the Fisherman House (good for the view, great for the clams). When we woke up she made us her famous breakfast burritos, hash browns and coffee. She sent us home with leftovers, a pear from her tree AND a cooler bag for us to bring it down to SD with us.
Manager Response: Hi Brianna and Terence, it was such a pleasure to host you both; please come visit again and spend a few days in South OC when you go to the wedding in SLO next year. whalewatching, Catalina, Laguna.....Further south and east, the San Diego Zoo and Wild Animal Park are worth a visit along with the wine country in Temecula, Fallbrook and Julian. Hugs, Freda and Indy

Summary: Freda is the sweetest. The breakfast's were amazing. It was like staying with an old friend. San Clemente is beautiful. It is so peaceful and the pier is a great place to walk and watch surfers. We will be back.
Manager Response: Hi Cindy and Darren, it was such a delight hosting you both. Look forward to your return visit...check out Freda's Favorites that I emailed you so you can return when we have one of the many special events in SC! Hugs, Freda and Indy

Summary: Comfortable, hospitable, lovely.  A gem, highly recommended.  Freda is a thoughtful and highly accomplished dynamo of a lady who has created a relaxing, comfortable oasis in the heart of San Clemente.  She makes an abundant, fresh, and expertly-cooked breakfast you can enjoy on the front porch, or in the mini-grotto side garden.  There's always a plate of homemade cookies in the entryway.  And books, to enjoy on couches in her living room.  And even a trike and helmet available for pedaling around the neighborhood, to the beach, etc. She even gave us a lift in her car -- and then at her insistence later came back and picked us up.  Our stay was brief, as we were passing thru on our way up the coast, but it was a vacation unto itself.

With only a short stop planned in San Clemente on our summer vacation, for a business related event, I still could not make myself book a boring hotel room because I am a B&B fanatic. What a pleasant surprise to discover Freda and her lovely vintage San Clemente home/B&B, the Always Inn San Clemente!  Located steps away from the Avenida Del Mar with its quaint shops and delicious eateries (no franchises here!) we discovered a new favorite wine bar and cheese shop while waiting for Freda to return from one of her altruistic volunteer activities in the local community which on that day was feeding starving artists and taking snacks to shopkeepers who were unable to get out of their small shops for lunch.  While waiting for her, It didn't matter that we couldn't check in

This B&B is owned by a very sweet lady who does everything she can to help you enjoy your stay.  She has 3 rooms available for rent in her house--each one is a bedroom with an attached bathroom and has a TV, stocked refrigerator, spa tub, and lots of lotion, bubble bath, shampoo, shower gel, etc., etc., plus AC and ceiling fan.  Her house reminds me of my grandmother's, chocked full of lots of interesting stuff, with cookies always available.  She greets you at the door with a big hug, gives you little gifts and good advice, and cooks a magnificent breakfast.  We definitely would go back.
Manager Response: Dear Dustin and Dennis:  It was such a pleasure to host you both.  How did the hash browns heat up at home? Please visit again and thank you so much for the kind words on tripadvisor.com!  Hugs,  Freda and Indy

Summary: Frida's kindness and warmth was exactly what my sister and I needed for a weekend getaway for us to remember our mother. Great location, delicious food and comfy rooms/beds. Frida's company and that of her dog and friend filled our hearts and stomachs. ❤️

We do a ton of traveling and I must say, this was probably one of the nicest stays ever, mind you I do a bit of traveling. We had a warm welcome by Freda and her friend. The room was very cozy and the bed super comfortable. There was goodies at the house and fresh fruit. Freda was extremely hospitable which is why I can see why her guests return. I can tell you I will definitely be returning to this place soon.   I woke up to the smell of coffee and some excellent smell of Freda cooking in the kitchen. I had a seat on the veranda as she served us fresh fruit and yogurt, a delicious warm pastry, homemade breakfast burrito and her amazing home potatoes. Not to mention her chorizo bake and fresh guacamole salsa.   I can tell you this might be the first 5 star place Ive truly ever

My husband and I recently traveled from Florida to California. We were staying in Palm Desert for the week but took a day trip to the coast to enjoy views of the Pacific Ocean I once called home. On our way back, we were both exhausted and, through TripAdvisor, found the Always Inn B&B. Fortunately, Freda had an open room and welcomed us in like family. Having not planned to stay the night, we did not have any toiletries but Freda had everything we needed! We slept so good and woke up refreshed. Freda prepared a wonderful breakfast for us and we shared life stories over Mimosas on the front patio. She sent us off with maps of the wine country, some of her delicious spice mix she uses in her homestyle potatoes, and just an overall feeling of love and happiness! We look forward to

Summary Heading: Great Stay  Great Host Great Breakfast
Summary: The wife & I wanted to get away for the Easter Weekend at the last minute and we were lucky to book the Always Inn..  Read the reviews and knew that we  could possibly be sharing the B&B home with others, which we thought may be a lil awkward. However when we arrived Freda, Host & owner   greeted us and made us feel at home.  We were also very lucky that  we were the only guests that night.. I booked the Palm Whisperer room (center most room), but Freda was kind enough to let us choose whatever room we liked..  We ended up choosing the Palm Mist, which had the closest access to our parking spot through the backyard patio area. Freda gave us a great recommendation for dinner (South of Nick's),  We absolutely loved it.   After a very restful sleep, In the morning Freda made  us a

Freda is the most hospitable innkeeper and she serves such fresh, yummy food (not only huge gourmet breakfasts, but cookies, and a few other surprise snacks). She's full of generosity and helped my mom and I get the most out of our getaway weekend by making shopping and restaurant recommendations. We will definitely return!

Summary Heading: Always kind, always open ... pretty special place
Summary: My sister and I stayed at Always Inn just after Christmas. Freda was kind, helpful and went out of her way to make sure we were supremely comfortable ... location is awesome - right off the main street in the gorgeous village of San Clemente. Could not have had a better stay ... except maybe if we could have stayed longer.

Freda is the passionate owner who is eager, very eager to please and ensure you are made welcome, and make the most of your stay in the delightful town of San Clemente which she is so proud of. A VERY personal, small B&B with a very homely feel and superb artworks and a superb central location for all local amenities. The breakfasts are superb and differ everyday. On-site parking.

Summary Heading: Lovely experience, perfect location to downtown San Clemente
Summary: The owner was delightful.  She has been in SC for many years and gives excellent recommendations for restaurants and shopping all within a block or two.   A short walk (downhill) to the Pier and beach areas.  A few minutes drive to the San Juan Capistrano historic area.  Found this charming B&B on Rocketmiles.  Be sure to call and confirm your reservation as it goes thru another service (Orbitz or Travelocity I believe).  Perfect room with sitting area and private bath.  Breakfast was wonderful out on the patio, with a few extra goodies to go!

I just love this little slice of heaven! Frieda is the best! Great location near downtown but quiet, a short pleasant walk to the pier. Frieda is very accommodating and flexible about making your stay wonderful. Her rates are very low she just loves what she does. Knows everyone in town and is delighted to help you. It's a delightful experience far from the chain hotels that charge twice as much or more. And her breakfasts are fabulous clearly she loves to cook and it shows. If you're on a long trip and need TLC, this is the place!
Manager Response: Nelson, you were a delight to host and we can't wait for you to visit and stay a little longer in San Clemente! I was trying to think of your second doggie's name - Molly and ?  Bring them next time.

Summary Heading: The place to stay in San Clemente!!
Summary: This summer I stayed the third time in Always Inn. I love this place especially the hospitable Freda who is the owner of the bed & breakfast. One thing you never will forget is the gorgeous breakfast with fresh fruits, bacon, eggs, delicious dips etc. When I stay there I feel at home. Looking forward to my next stay there. :) Yours, Peter  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C_2lRJiDr0A

We loved everything about this place.  Walked from the train, had a wonderful breakfast,  lots of things to take to the beach,  frieda was so cool too! There are only 3 rooms so it is very personal.  We are vegetarian amd frieda made us delicious breakfast and event sent us away with veggi chili and a selfie stick! We had a blast!

Wow! Home away from home!! My husband and I felt like family. The hostess with the mostest! Freda is so generous and so helpful, her desire is to make sure her guests have everything they need, and then some.

Our 34th anniversary weekend could not have been more perfect and all because of Freda!  She is so special and makes everyone else feel special too.  Her cooking is amazing!  Her thoughtfulness is unbelievable....the most giving person ever!  Her restaurant recommendations were great.  She also arranged a massage for us and a candlelight dinner!  Such a romantic day!  Her "Indy" greeted our "Nikki"...so-o nice to have a pet friendly B&B! Our room was great...colorful and comfy.  Lovely patio...plants everywhere!  Shopping was fun...even throughout her house!  I have several treasures from Always Inn and can't wait to return for another fabulous stay!  Thank you Freda & Indy!

Such a quaint home and very comfortable and clean! The breakfast was amazing everyday and Freda gave us great insight into the area! I loved being able to walk to wonderful restaurants and shops. We had to leave unexpectedly early on the day we were leaving and Freda even gave us a bag for our breakfast to go! We will definitely be going back! Freda is simply a wonderful hostess!

What an AMAZING weekend! We had a problem with or booking on hotels.com but Freda helped resolve the situation so that my husband could keep our plans. But that was simply beginning. Freda is an amazing hostess and a wonderful cook. You really need to come enjoy her wonderful meals! Wonderful "comfort gourmet" breakfast. She was full of wonderful recommendations for everything from restaurants to shopping to a perfect beach day, she even provide the beach towels and chairs! Here breakfast casseroles were delicious and never ending! Enjoyed your breakfast on her lovely patios. So in closing let me just say don't miss an opportunity to stay with Freda at her wonderful B&B. We are all ready planning for our next visit!

Nothing better can be said than that it felt like we were at home our entire stay.  Freda was such an amazing host.  We had never met until our stay and when we walked in the door her smile and warmth made it feel like we had knew her our entire lives.  Our room was very nice with snacks a other little comforts. Breakfast was amazing, ask her about a few of the cooking awards she has won! We got to take home food because there was so much and we loved it all!  The BnB is literally a few steps from the main shopping drag and only a couple more min to drive down to the pier.   If you are looking for an experience and not a sterile hotel room, we highly suggest you stay here.  We were introduced to multiple shop owners and honestly got the most unique experience that we were not

AlwaysInn is an excellent B&B in San Clemente.  Freda was a very welcoming hostess and cooks a great huge breakfast. This is right around the corner from cool shops and restaurants. And Freda's little dog Indy was very welcoming to me and my wife. We were celebrating our 7th anniversary.

Summary Heading: I would recommend anyone stay here. AMAZING EXPERIENCE
Summary: The always inn is a hidden gem along with Freda and of course Indie 500 (the dog). Freda was so welcoming from the moment we arrived. She went out of her way to help us on our travels. We are 25 and backpacking around the world. Freda and the always inn b&b are the highlight of our trip so far. I would HIGHLY recommend you stay. She is such a knowledgable seasoned traveller who gives advice and suggestions as part of conversation. She wanted to help us as she could see we're just starting our travels and struggling slightly. To sum up Freda gave us an incredible experience and I would most definitely recommend anyone stays with Freda and Indie. We will certainly be back. Such a gem!! We also had a blast with another guest called Sue who is a friend of Freda's who was is also an

If you enjoy a warm welcome, and a fabulous hearty breakfast, this is the spot!  Freda welcomes one as a long lost friend, even when it's one's first visit.  The location is ideal. I walked down to the pier everyday, and to the restaurants of my choice.  If you're a minimalist, you may feel overwhelmed by all the tchotchkes.  I felt they gave a warm interest to the place.  Can hardly wait to go again!

This was really a good choice close to the water peaceful at night lovely staff restaurants close by clean & comfortable room. I really hope to go back to this very friendly and amazing city one day I miss home(USA).

My wife and I stayed here for one night as a base to explore San Clemente. Our room was very comfortable room, and the locations is excellent.  We were able to walk to the ocean pier and to an excellent restaurant for dinner.  We attended a local theater production at a venue right across the street from the B&B.  Freda was a delightful host.  She spent time talking with us, answering our many questions, and delighting us with her stories.  We shared many travel interests in common and will definitely return for future visits.

Recently spent a couple of days celebrating a dear Friend's Bday exploring SC and we stayed at the Always Inn-  What a BONUS !!  Freda (the Inn's Owner) prepared a delicious gourmet breakfast and also knows EVERYTHING about the area and shares this valuable info freely.  It makes such a difference getting the "Inside Scoop" about where to eat and where to shop, etc.  Additionally, Freda does her very best to be sure you feel like part of the family and have a Great Time!  Her adorable little dog, Indy, even helped me not be so homesick for my own pups!  Had a wonderful and memorable experience and am looking forward to another visit soon...
Manager Response: Hi Theresa, you were the "bonus" to Linda's birthday celebration...it was such fun sharing the "Rodeo Drive of Thrift Stores" and the bargains at Refinds in San Clemente with you...look forward to our day at the beauty school in the next couple of weeks! Come with your family to the vacation rental!

Summary: Freda was an excellent hostess and awesome chef. The brunch was killer.  All the extra touches for my birthday:  the flowers balloon chocolate strawberries wine and gifts were so sweet and made me feel extra special. I can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Linda, we were so honored that you chose Always Inn San Clemente for your birthday getaway! Look forward to hosting you again soon...long before your next birthday! Thanks for taking the time to post a review! Freda and Indy

Summary: The owner, Freda was so friendly and accommodating.  She truly went out of her way for us.  I took my mom for two nights to celebrate her 83rd birthday.  Freda took it upon herself to get my mom a special treat.  She also gave us free passes to visit the San Juan Capistrano Mission.  Her breakfasts were wonderful and she really knows the area which helps a lot if one isn't from the area.  If you want privacy, she senses that and gives it to you. The Always Inn's location is perfect.  You can walk everywhere!  Her little dog Indy is really devoted to her and quite friendly.  My mom has thanked me over and over for taking her and wants to return!  I highly recommend Always Inn San Clemente B&B.
Manager Response: Dayna, it was so special to host you and your Mom for her 83rd birthday. We have a lot of "Mom and me" guests and it is a lot of fun to share our love for the treasures in our community with you! Come visit again this summer!

Summary: Freedia is a great host. Location couldn't be better. We love it and will be back as often as possible. You can't beat th e breakfast and any needs are acomidaed. Makes us want to move to San clemente. Gardens are beautiful as well
Manager Response: David and Linda, Indy and I loved hosting you both; please email us photos of the wedding and come back when you want to escape the heat of Las Vegas!

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our two-day stay here. Freda is gracious and personable, making you feel like a member of the family the moment you walk in. The breakfasts were terrific, and Freda is more than willing to recommend local eateries for great dining out experiences. The inn itself enjoys a highly eclectic decorative style, although we happened to come just as Freda was putting up Christmas. A neat bonus!  There are not many places my wife and I say we'd love to visit again, but the Always Inn is one of those. Highly recommended for a relaxing atmosphere and comfortable accommodations!

My stay here was like no other.  We came to stay with Frieda to attend a memorial service for a family member.  She greeted us at the door and instantly made us feel like family.  She was kind and compassionate and our room was cozy, just like a home away from home.  Her food is terrific and the location is excellent.  Shopping and beach are withing walking distance.  I will definitely stay there again.

Guest are able to see the FILTH of kitchen, laundry room etc. Shower/ bath was not Jacuzzi or even close and did not work properly even as a shower. Missing or broken blinds all bedroom windows so no privacy what so ever.
Manager Response: This review is more than bizarre in its accusations and inaccuracies.    We do not have a guest by your name who stayed at our tiny three room property during June 2014 so will contact tripadvisor.com to get more information about your review and credentials.  We strive to serve our guests with a servant's heart as evidenced by winning Tripadvisor.com's award of excellence for three years and the best of yelp in Orange County for 2014.  We are completely taken aback at your hateful comments posted four months after your purported stay.  We look forward to learning more about this strange review.

Summary Heading: Great Place for Date Night in Town
Summary: We had such a lovely time at Always Inn. We had an event to attend in the evening at Casa Romantica, so it was a perfect location to walk to the Casa. The rooms were so clean and the owner has so many interesting photos and decor that you feel like your staying in a cozy travel museum. All you need for a wonderful weekend at the beach is here. Beach towels, umbrellas, sun screen, water bottles etc. all walking distance to the beach and great shops and restaurants in town.  The rooms are big and well equipped and the bed was so comfortable. The breakfast was delicious. Thanks for a delightful date night at your Inn.

Summary Heading: Home away from home tucked away near downtown San Clemente, CA
Summary: We were very grateful that we found the Always Inn in San Clemente, CA for my husband's birthday weekend. He had just arrived from Panama, Central America and wanted a quiet retreat type place and we found it at the Always Inn. The breakfasts were delicious and the owner, Frieda, was a delight and most helpful.  If you plan to move to this area this is the place to stay, Frieda knows a lot about what is going on and she is well connected with the locals. Our daughter's friends from Sweden and Norway joined us and also thoroughly loved the breakfast out on the deck.  The back deck is a little heaven and the garden lovely.  Having a fridge in the room was also a great plus, as was being so near to the shopping area and beach. Frieda's recommendations for meals were excellent.  We

Summary Heading: Great location and awesome inn keeper!
Summary: My husband and I stayed here last weekend after purchasing a two night stay through Groupon.  We loved it! Not only is it within walking distance to all the great shops and restaurants, but it's only about a 5-10 minute walk to the beach and pier.  Frieda, the owner of Always Inn, was extremely welcoming and immediately urged us to make ourselves at home.  Her cooking is just fabulous and after one of her huge and delicious breakfasts, you won't be needing lunch! She also has cookies, snacks, and coffee and tea out throughout the day, which is a nice touch. The Inn itself only has three rooms to stay in and we chose The Palm Whisper because of the great patio attached to our room.  A perfect place to sip your coffee in the morning or just enjoy the fresh ocean breeze. The

I stayed here two weeks over the Christmas holiday with my husband who is a Marine at Camp Pendleton. I loved this place!The room was nice,(I enjoyed the whirlpool tub and the fire place in the living room), it is walking distance to many shops, restaurants, and the beach, but the customer service was the best! The owner is amazing. She served a wonderful hot breakfast every morning, and she was more than willing to serve special dietary needs as I noticed she did for other guests who were there. You really feel at home in this place. The owner, Freda, knows everything about the surrounding area! She knows about normal tourist attractions, but also shared information with us that only locals would know. She had free coupons for a local attraction for us, and she even made me

As others have noted, the location and breakfast at this wonderful B&B are unbeatable, but it's the friendliness and helpfulness of Freda that really makes it successful.When you stay here, you really do feel as if you're staying in a friend's home, it's that relaxed and charming.We felt like part of the family.From now on , we won't stay anywhere else in San Clemente.  Chuck H

We arrived late on a Saturday night, however, due to a booking error (not Freda's fault) there were  no rooms available. Freda invited us in and insisted she would find something for us. She offered drinks and then set about ringing her housekeeper to get a property ready. She then recommended a place for us to eat whilst she sorted the details. Freda insisted we went for breakfast the next morning. Freda you did us proud, loved the fruit bowl and all the other delicacies you came up with. It was only a one night stay but if you fancy a change from hotel chains and conversation with someone who is genuinely interested this is a great place to stay. Freda thank you very much for helping us - it was much appreciated.

Summary Heading: Great hospitality, yummy breakfasts and  great location
Summary: Signed up for a living social deal for 2 nights- although it was a rainy stormy weekend, we still enjoyed our stay at this cute beach bed and breakfast. Our room was a bit on the small side, but it didn't matter as we spent so much time walking around town, at the beach and at local restaurants. The owner Freda is gracious and a wonderful hostess. She makes you feel at home instantly. This is not for those of you who are looking for a 5 star hotel. This is however for those travelers who are looking for a down to earth, friendly and cozy place. The homemade breakfasts are delicious. The walk to the beach is only 10 minutes and 5 minutes to downtown which has great shops and restaurants. Thanks for a fun stay Freda :)

This was our first experience at a B&B and me and my husband loved it. We came down on a friday evening and Freida welcomed us warmly with cookies. She made a few suggestions for dinner and let us settle in. That night we stayed in and watched a DVD from the over 100+ collection. The following morning, we anxiously awaited the famous breakfast - started off with a fresh fruit bowl, then a warm pastry and muffin as a second course and ended with a savory meal of country fried potatoes, sausage and an omelet. We were more than stuffed with all the delicious food. Freida also gave us a pass to check out the San Juan Capistrano Mission - it was beautiful and also next to where we were married. The following morning's breakfast did not disappoint either - we had the fresh fruit and

Summary Heading: May have been our first time, absolutely wont be our last!!
Summary: My boyfriend and I could not wait to celebrate out Anniversary and Valentines when we booked our trip to San Clemente. When we arrived we were greeted by the most amazing hostess any one could ask for. Freda was very delightful and full of life. Her smile completely lit up the room making her home extremely inviting. This was the first time Eric and I had ever been to a B&B and with the excellent hospitality we received from Freda, it will not be our last. In fact we are booking for May this year.   From the moment we arrived we felt like royalty, she treats her guests top notch! She had a bountiful amount of information on things to do in the area, places to eat and things to avoid. The rooms were exteremly clean and loved the private bathrooms in each room. Even down to the

When I arrived I was welcomed with open arms by Freda the owner of the Always Inn which immediately made me feel at home. And an eclectic and charming home it is. Cozy and comfortable with all the amenities one would need for a memorable stay.  Now all that would have been enough to entice anyone for a repeat visit but Freda preceded next morning to cook me a gourmet breakfast which by the way was the best I've ever been served at a B&B. On top of all that the location is superb in walking distance to the fine restaurants and shops that reside in the  the beautiful village of San Clemente. Thanks for your hospitality and pass to the Mission at San Juan Capistrano. See you soon.

We were able to arrive early in the day, on a Saturday.  The house is cozy, with so many art objects to ooo and ahhh over.  The room was clean and had a private bathroom.  It had an electric heater that looked like a pot belly stove.  The room also had a private entrance to the beautiful patio, fully equipped with plants, lanterns, wind chimes, patio furniture and privacy.  It was wonderful.  We went down to the pier during the day and had lunch and walked the pier.  After we came back up, we relaxed in the room and got ready for a walk to the downtown for dinner. It was only a half a block away from the main drag.  A wonderful location for being able to drink and walk!!!  We went to Beach Fire, a great sports bar/ really great restaurant!!! The food was outstanding and the

Summary Heading: GREAT PLACE, GREAT HOST, INCREDIBLE EXPERIENCE
Summary: My wife and me stayed at Always Inn B&B during the Christmas and New Year season.   I have stayed at numerous B&B's and this one is the best. The location is incredible. A short walk and you are at the beach. Numerous local shops, restaurants and art galleries are a 2 minute walk from the door.   Freda is an incredible host. She took  my wife to the spa and shopping on days when I had to work. When we went to Catalina Island, she drove us there and picked us up. She showed me and my wiife around local area introducing us to local restaurants. The food is incredible and Freda went above and beyond to ensure we had anything and everything that we wanted.   I recommend this B&B to everyone I meet. There is no place that will take care of you better than Freda's Always Inn B&B.

This place is great. Very cozy and the owner, Frieda, is wonderful. She truly made us feel like we were family just staying over at her home. The rooms are nice, the location is great and the breakfast is tremendous. She offers military discounts and also does parties. Highly recommend this place.

I stayed two nights over the Thanksgiving holiday at the Idyllwild location for this same business.   When i arrived the cabin was ice cold... and the furnace did not work.   I spent quite some time trying to get the pilot light lit and could not.   Others came to help and they could not get it fixed.  Then we got some firewood and tried to heat the cabin with the wood stove.   The chimney was plugged and the cabin filled with smoke.  We opened all the windows obviously choosing the cold air over the smoke.   Long story short... we spent a cold night in Idyllwild.   This was how i spent my Thanksgiving evening this year.  And this is not my major complaint.   After much correspondence with this owner... we were still charged for this night.   I don't have (good) words for this
Manager Response: Paul and Rachel, you are not reviewing your experience at Always Inn San Clemente, which is ranked the #1 bed and breakfast in Orange County for the second year in a row.  Assume you are somehow attempting to besmirch our reputation.  Please know that you have been billed correctly.  No charge for the Thanksgiving night when the furnace died.  Only charged for the two nights after that you stayed.  Furnaces sometimes die without warning, which is what happened when you arrived.  The furnace certainly worked for the guests at Always Inn Idyllwild on 11.19 and 11.20.  It worked for Martha Lopez when she prepped the Sleeping Beauty cottage for your arrival for Thanksgiving.  The fireplace worked for guests 11.19 and 11.20 but you and your girlfriend said it didn’t two days later.  When I learned that our handyman couldn’t help, I offered a full refund – based on you checking out and checking into one of three places that had availability in Idyllwild.  You and your girlfriend chose not to leave.  Yet she left numerous hateful messages on my cell phone threatening lawsuits and more.  I sent you an email confirmation that you acknowledged stating that checkout was at 11 a.m.  Martha Lopez came to clean at 1 p.m.  You both were still there.  Martha came again at 4 p.m., you were still there.  My neighbors will testify that you both were there after Martha left.  You were correctly billed for the second day, as I’ve advised you in numerous emails.  If you choose to attack a sister bed and breakfast in your attempt to receive something for nothing, you are knocking on the wrong door.  I treat all my guests with kindness, caring and consideration.  If you feel you didn’t receive that from us, it is because we observed you might be a scam artist.

Summary Heading: Beautiful spot with a real family feel
Summary: The Always Inn is in an ideal location in the beautiful, sleepy beach community of San Clemente. But the real appeal is the personal touches and the persona of the owner, Freda. Her breakfasts are superb, her knowledge of the area vast, and her kindness and willingness to connect unusual and very special. I was in San Clemente visiting my son and he was made to feel most welcome at the Inn anytime. Freda was genuinely interested in our lives and shared hers with us generously. The Always Inn has 3 separate lush outdoor spaces in which to eat, sit, and relax that are really lovely. If you love orchids, you are in for a treat. Freda is an absolute peach and I can honestly say, "the hostess with the mostest!"

This little B&B in the heart of San Clemente is a real gem!  Freda, the owner, treated my sisters and me as if we were long lost family members.  She anticipated our every need before we even knew what we needed.  What a wonderful way to start each morning, sitting on the deck enjoying Freda's expertly prepared and served breakfasts. With the Inn being located just off Del Mar, we were able to experience the flavor of San Clemente on foot.  Freda became our chauffeur from the moment we left OC airport until we were returned there three fun filled days later. This may become the yearly retreat for we three sisters. Thank you, Freda

My sisters and I recently stayed at the Always Inn.  I had the best time and was extremely pleased with the location of the Inn and the services offered. The quaint Inn is owned by Freda, who is the inn keeper, chef, concierge, tour guide, photographer, driver, and "all-round do it all" business woman.  Freda really went out of her way to make our visit to San Clemente enjoyable.  She prepared an exceptional morning breakfast, and I don't mean just an ordinary breakfast, it was a two or three course meal; totally chef-quality.....YUMMY!!!!  The eclectic décor of the Inn was very interesting and Indy, Freda's dog, made me feel right at home.  The Always Inn should ALWAYS be considered the INN of choice when in the San Clemente area.  Freda, Thank you so much.

This warm and charming home on a little-traveled side street in the heart of San Clemente is furnished and decorated in the most interesting manner. The hostess, Freda, is welcoming and trusting in addition to being a gifted cook. Her varied and complete breakfasts were more than  we could eat - and we regretted not having bigger appetites. We loved staying in this little gem of a B&B, and will certainly put it on our itinerary when we come to San Clemente in the future.

I live a few blocks away from the Always Inn. My well-traveled brother came to town for a visit and decided he would rather not stay on my couch. He was very happy with the Always Inn and Freda, the charming innkeeper. Freda is quite the hostess. I really appreciate that she invited me to have breakfast with my brother all the mornings he was there. And she is a fantastic cook! One of her meals can keep you going for the entire day.  Freda starts out with fruit and a pastry. Then the main course comes. My favorite was the breakfast burrito with homemade salsas and guacamole yum. The meals are vegetarian friendly. There is also a piano in the living room, which we made good use of.  Glad to know she is right around the corner. Now I know where to send my guests.

Summary Heading: Best 'Bed and Breakfast' Experience my Wife and I have Ever Had
Summary: Located in the heart of San Clemente this Bed and Breakfast stay was a wonderful experience.  We only stayed there one night - but it was a like a visit to a favorite relative's house. Freda, the inn keeper was warm and knowledgeable, loads you up with goodies such as chocolates, cookies, sun tan lotion, beach amenities, etc. - and the food! Breakfast was fantastic.  It's quaint.  It's small.  But it's not an impersonal hotel stay.  It's a real bed and breakfast.  Highly recommended.

This is by far the best experience I have had at a Bed & Breakfast, Food was awesome and I am a chef with a picky appetite, Always Inn is in a prime location with walking distance to shops, and the beach. Anything you need as a guest the owner Freda will go out of her way to provide....talk about service...wow on top of that she will sit down with you for a chat if you want and knows all the ins & outs of San Clemente...if you want to be relaxed and just enjoy your stay this is the place to get away....Freda has this dog Ida that is so friendly you just want to take her home, do not bring any dog treats though she only eats protein like us....and has a chef for her master...win win... My wife and I will be back...Dan & Maryam

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay in San Clemente
Summary: The location was perfect for us, just a block off Del Mar (San Clemente's main street) and a healthful walk from the beach and pier.  Freda, the host, was very friendly and accommodating and had lots of good information to share about San Clemente.  The food was delicious and the portions large.  This is a pet friendly inn and our dog was made welcome by Freda and her dog Indy.  Indy is also a great host and our dog enjoyed her gourmet dog treats.  We were very comfortable at this inn and would happily stay with Freda again on our next trip to San Clemente.

We went with our small daughter to this Inn and found ourselves like at home.. the owner is a wonderful and attentive host with a lot of attentions for our daughter. The room are quite small but really confortable and all the possible gadgets for our days at the sea and for everything we could need. The patio of our room was very nice and our little one liked the flowers and feeding the small birds. The position is very central to San Clemente and convenient for everything (specially the happy hours at the pier!). We had a parking lot which in SC is really a plus. I strongly reccomend it.

After a disappointing start to our weekend, we stumbled across the Always Inn Bed and Breakfast and were taken in by the best innkeeper I have ever met!  She welcomed my husband and I plus our dog into her home at 10pm and gave us the most relaxing weekend I have had in awhile.  She pampered us and fed us so well that we didn't ever want to leave.
